text:
Justin Bieber fans slam him online

A few fans have slammed Justin Bieber online for allegedly making fans pay a lot of money for pictures with his life-size cardboard cutout at his recent Las Vegas show.

They were disappointed when he announced he had cancelled all future meet and greets on his ongoing tour. Some, who had paid $2,000 to see him, got even more disappointed when they were greeted with a cardboard cutout of the pop superstar in a backstage room at his Las Vegas show over the weekend, reported Aceshowbiz.

It’s unclear if the cutout was put there on purpose or not, but the irate fans vented their frustration on Twitter. “Someone stop Justin Bieber his lack of respect for his fans right now is making me sick to my stomach... Cardboard cutout for 2K...,” a fan wrote, while another tweeted: “If you’re ever feeling sad just remember there’s a bunch of people who paid USD 2000 to meet a cardboard cut out of Justin Bieber.” — PTI
title: ENT-BIEBER
